citations.narrative:
*** The licensee recently placed the majority of his animals at other facilities but did not have any records of disposition
showing where the animals went to. This included a zebu, two goats, two cavy's, an armadillo, and 5 rabbits. These
records must be maintained in an accurate and timely manner for recordkeeping purposes.
Correct by: Feb 15, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
*** The licensee recently placed the majority of his animals at other facilities but did not have any records of disposition 
showing where the animals went to. This included a zebu, two goats, two cavy's, an armadillo, and 5 rabbits. These 
records must be maintained in an accurate and timely manner for recordkeeping purposes. 
 
Correct by: Feb 15, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
